Name: Next to Last Word
Ingredients: 3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A floral riff on the classic Last Word with maraschino to the fore. The original, equal-parts, recipe is a touch on the sweet side. The addition of saline solution subtly improves this cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Next to Last Word contains 165 calories
